title: Importing Libraries
subtitle: SPIKE™ Prime with Python
description: Students learn how to import libraries in Python and why this is important when connecting software and hardware.

title: Life Cycles
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo learned that tadpoles are baby frogs. He wonders how other animals and plants change as they grow.

title: Solving Problems When Environments Change
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie learned that people will put a building in the wetland near her home. She’s worried it will hurt the birds and other animals that live there.

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 2)
title: Redesigning to Make New Objects
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo wants to make something for his dog to eat. Help him build the tools he needs in the kitchen.

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 4)
title: Communicate with Light and Sound
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel lives across the street from Sofie. What can he build to send messages to her?

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 4)
title: Classify and Choose Materials
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel got some chickens. Help him build a chicken coop where they’ll be safe and comfortable.

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 3)
title: Pollination
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria saw bees on the flowers of her apple tree. She wonders what they’re doing. Can you help her learn?

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 1)
title: Illumination
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie thinks something is under her bed. Can you help her see it?

title: Animals in Their Habitats
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie, Daniel, Maria, and Leo visit a desert. They wonder how the animals and plants survive where it is so dry.

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 3)
title: Transparency
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo wants to make some shade on a sunny day. What materials should he use? Help him find out.

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 2)
title: Musical Vibration
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria plays piano. She wants to make more music. Can you build her something to play on?

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 1)
title: Habitats
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie learned about the places giraffes live. She wonders about the other animals that live there. What about other places? Can you help her learn?

title: Animal Behavior
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria sees that African buffalo live in large herds. She wonders why they live in groups rather than on their own.

catTitle: Science - See It! Hear It! Build It! (Lesson 5)
title: Using Ideas from Nature
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel, Sofie, Leo, and Maria learned that some lightbulbs were made using ideas from how fireflies make light. Help them learn about other ideas we get from nature.

catTitle: Science in Nature and Our Daily Life (Lesson 5)
title: Protection from Wind
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel, Sofie, Leo, and Maria felt a strong wind at the park. It blew a lot of the soil away. What could happen to the animals in the park? Can you help the team protect the soil?

title: Matter
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria notices that when she opens the window, her papers blow around the room. How does that happen?

title: Preparing for the Weather
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel learned that strong storms can damage pet houses. Help him design a pet house that keeps animals safe even in storms.

title: Prepare for Natural Hazards
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo knows some places have earthquakes. To keep people safe, help him design buildings that won’t be destroyed by earthquakes.

title: How Eyes See
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel finds something while exploring a dark cave. Can you help him see it better?

title: Protect the Environment
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Leo takes good care of Spike Town. How can you care for the environment in your community?

title: Daytime and Nighttime
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie wants to light the path near her campsite for safety. Help her set an overhead lamp to be on at night when it’s dark.

title: Energy Resources
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Sofie finds a wind turbine. She wonders how it gets energy. What are other ways to get energy from nature to use again and again?

title: Information Transfer
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria, Leo, Daniel, and Sofie use a special code to share ideas. Make your own code to communicate with your friends!

title: Gravity
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel loves the way birds stay balanced, even when a branch moves. Help him make a model bird that can stay balanced too.

title: Animal Structures
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Maria sees an elephant eating. She wonders about ways elephants can use their trunks. Help her learn.

title: Energy Flow
subtitle: SPIKE™ Essential
description: Daniel, Maria, Leo, and Sofie know that plants use sunlight to grow bigger. Do animals also need it to grow bigger? Build a model to show the team the relationship between sunlight and animal growth.

title: Jeesun and Jayden Need to Work it Out
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understanding how actions affect others and resolving conflicts in constructive ways.

title: Jeesun and Jayden Learn That Accidents Happen
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understanding that accidents are unintentional.

title: Jayden Feels Disappointed
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Recognizing and dealing with feelings of disappointment.

title: Maddox Invades Jayden's Space
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Learning about and respecting other people's personal space.

title: Zoey Feels Embarrased
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Recognizing the feeling of embarrassment and how to deal with it.

title: Jeesun Feels Left Out
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Recognizing and dealing with feelings of jealousy.

title: Jeesun's Anger Monster
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understand how to deal with anger and how to calm down again.

title: Jayden Tries Something New
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understanding and learning about perseverance.

title: Zoey Takes A Stand
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Develop an understanding that people have different preferences and dealing with disagreements.

subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understanding how your behavior affects others.

title: Jeesun's Rotten Day
subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Recognizing and naming emotions and understanding how to deal with sadness.

title: Explore Helping Machines

description: In this lesson children will investigate how machines help people, design their own machines and work together to build different versions.

subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understand different terms for emotions, and how facial expressions and body language show how people are feeling.

title: Meet the Characters

title: Explore Special Machine Parts

description: The objective of this lesson is for children to use spatial awareness to understand how objects move, observe and describe special parts and functions. The children will build a model with a special part and demonstrate how it works.

subtitle: Build Me "Emotions"
description: Understand what anxiety means and how to deal with it.

subtitle: Tech Machines
description: In this lesson children will learn about the function of wheels, and use spatial awareness to understand how wheeled vehicles move.

title: Safety First
subtitle: Tech Machines
description: In this lesson children will start to use planning to solve problems, they will get an understanding of how safety elements function and explore the engineering process by designing, building, and testing models.

description: In this lesson children will investigate water vehicles, compare types of vehicles and talk about the function of propellers and anchors.

This lesson will help familiarize your students with the contents of the LEGO® Education BricQ Motion Essential Set. We recommend taking some time before the lesson to show your students what's beneath the white tray, and to explain that the bricks are sorted by color. Students will find the building instructions books under the tray. They'll only need book "A" for this unit.

This is a getting started activity where the children will begin matching numbers to quantities and practice counting and
recognizing the number of objects

title: Helping Each Other

title: Winch
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to mechanisms, structures, powered machines, winches, and fair testing.

title: Lever
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The lever is a simple machine that can be used to change the force that is applied (effort), alter the direction, and change the distance of movement.

title: Watch Tower
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to simple machines, structures, engineering, stability, performance, and fair testing.

title: My Home
subtitle: Our Community
description: To learn and understand characteristics of a home, and what similarities and differences there might be from home to home.

title: Ramp
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of simple machine; inclined plane and wheel and axle, measuring the effect of force on an object and mechanical advantage.

title: Moonbase
subtitle: WeDo 2.0 Core Set
description: Design a solution for a robot that would assemble a base on the moon.

title: Merry-go-round
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to mechanisms, structures, movement, balancing, and fair testing.

title: Bridge
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to structures, stability, safety, and fair testing.

title: Gear Racer
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of simple machines of gears, motion, position versus time, gear ratios, gear box and understand the metric system of measurements.

title: Beam Balance
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of levers, forces, effects of loads and solve problems involving scale factors.

title: Catapult
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to structures, engineering design, weight and counterweight, and fair testing.

title: Tower Crane
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of forces and structures, pulleys, controlling machines and mechanical advantage.

title: Wedge
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The wedge is a simple machine that is a modification of an inclined plane, however a wedge can move.

title: Wheel and Axle
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Wheel and Axle is a simple machine, often a big wheel and a small axle, which is secured to one another. A wheel and axle always rotate at the same speed.

title: Hand Cart
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to simple machines, mechanisms, structures, stability, performance, and fair testing.

title: Structures
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Structures is a simple machine in which individual parts are arranged to form a whole. All structures are under the influence of external and internal forces.

title: Simple Machines – Principle Models: Pulleys
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: The pulley is a simple machine that can be used to efficiently pull forces.

title: Pawl and Ratchet
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Pawl and ratchet is a simple machine that is used in connection with gear mechanisms to allow linear or rotary motion in only one direction.

title: Screw
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The screw is a simple machine and a modification of an inclined plane.

title: Simple Machines – Principle Models: Levers
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: The lever is a simple machine, a rigid bar or solid Object, that is used to transfer force.

title: Go-Cart
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Identify a wheel and axle as a simple machine and where friction might be found.

title: Pulley
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: A pulley is a simple machine that can be used to lift objects and transmit motion. Pulleys can be either movable or fixed and multiple pulley wheels on one axle can be used ad block and tackle.

title: Cam
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: A cam is a shaped frame turning about an axis, like a rotating wheel. Cams can control the timing and degree of movement.

title: Crazy Floors
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Explore and recognize that the turning ratio of one pulley to another is determined by the size of the pulleys.

title: Simple Machines – Principle Models: Gears
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: The gear is a simple machine that can be used to efficiently transfer force and motion.

title: Merry-Go-Round
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Explore and recognize that how fast or how slowly one gear makes another turn depends on the number of teeth on the gears and their position.

title: Catapult
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: Explore and recognize that the effectiveness of a lever depends on the arrangement of the pivot point, effort and load.

title: Gear
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The gear is a simple machine that can be used to efficiently transfer force and motion.

title: Inclined Plane
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The inclined plane is a slanted surface used to raise objects.

title: Roaming Vehicles
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design an autonomous car that is safe enough to drive on the streets.

title: Autonomous Intersection
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design an autonomous car that can safely cross an intersection.

title: Simple Machines – Principle Models: Wheels and Axles
subtitle: Simple Machines Set
description: The wheel and axle is a simple machine consisting of a big wheel and a small axle, which is secured to one another, to create movement.

title: Unlocking a Car
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design a way to use passcodes to protect cars from thieves.

title: Automatic Headlights
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design car features that will improve nighttime driving safety.

title: Autonomous Parking
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design cars that can park themselves safely without driver intervention.

title: Object Detection
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design ways to avoid accidents between vehicles and objects in the road.

title: Reversing Safely
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design features for a car that will improve safety as it reverses.

title: Cruise Control
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design a cruise control program to assist drivers by making their driving experience less stressful.

title: Line Detection
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Design ways to improve driving safety by helping to prevent drivers from falling asleep and causing an accident.

title: Power Car
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Investigating the speed and pulling power of a powered car with different arrangements of gears and wheels.

title: Lever
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The lever is a simple machine that can be used to change the force that is applied (effort), alter the direction, and change the distance of movement.

title: Trundle Wheel
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Design and make an accurate distance measuring device, measure, count, and calibrate scales for accuracy.

title: Freewheeling
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of mass, friction and potential and kinetic energy.

title: The Hammer
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of levers, cams, inclined plane, mechanical programming, data recording, friction, force and momentum.

title: Windmill
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of forces and motion, renewable energy, energy capture, storage and use.

title: Fishing Rod
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of pulleys, levers, pawl and ratchet, forces and properties of materials.

title: Land Yacht
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore sail shape, area and angle to the wind needed for a wind powered vehicle to effectively capture wind energy.

title: Structures
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Structures is a simple machine in which individual parts are arranged to form a whole. All structures are under the influence of external and internal forces.

title: The Walker
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of gears, levers, linkages, ratchet, force, friction and measuring time.

title: Wheel and Axle
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Wheel and Axle is a simple machine, often a big wheel and a small axle, which is secured to one another. A wheel and axle always rotate at the same speed.

title: The Lifter
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to pulleys, gears, forces, and fair testing.

title: Sweeper
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of bevel gears, gearing up, pulleys, safety systems, distance and friction.

title: Wedge
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The wedge is a simple machine that is a modification of an inclined plane, however a wedge can move.

title: Uphill Struggle
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to wheels and axles, friction, ratchets and gears, measuring, and fair testing.

title: Screw
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The screw is a simple machine and a modification of an inclined plane.

title: Pawl and Ratchet
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Pawl and ratchet is a simple machine that is used in connection with gear mechanisms to allow linear or rotary motion in only one direction.

title: Letter Balance
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of levers and gears, measuring weight and calibrating scales.

title: Inclined Plane
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The inclined plane is a slanted surface used to raise objects.

title: The Bat
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to levers, gears, cams, cranks, timing actions, and fair testing.

title: The Magic Lock
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to levers, structures, hinges, and fair testing.

title: Gear
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: The gear is a simple machine that can be used to efficiently transfer force and motion.

title: Scissor Lift
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Investigate how the function of a scissor lift is influenced by weight and height.

title: Pulley
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: A pulley is a simple machine that can be used to lift objects and transmit motion. Pulleys can be either movable or fixed and multiple pulley wheels on one axle can be used ad block and tackle.

title: Stamping Letters
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to levers, cams, gears, observing and improving, and fair testing.

title: Wind Turbine
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy with reference to conversion of wind energy to electrical energy.

title: Flywheeler
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of gearing up, measuring distance, forces, moving energy, friction and air.

title: Beaten
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to gears and pulleys, energy efficiency, and fair testing.

title: Dragster
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of gears, levers, wheels, energy, friction and measuring distances.

title: Solar Vehicle
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy with reference to conversion of solar energy to electrical energy

title: Click-Clock
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of gear mechanisms, measuring time, calibrating scales and investigating momentum.

title: Solar Station
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy with reference to conversion of solar energy to electrical energy

title: Cam
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: A cam is a shaped frame turning about an axis, like a rotating wheel. Cams can control the timing and degree of movement.

title: Moving Sign
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to simple machines, mechanisms, solar energy, movability, performance, and fair testing.

title: Robot Arm
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Investigate how to make the most energy efficient sequence for a Robot Arm.

title: Robot Hand
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Investigate what pressure is needed to hold different objects without dropping or crushing them.

title: Stamping Press
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Investigate how to make an energy efficient stamping press.

title: Scarecrow
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Design and make a pneumatic scarecrow model that moves.

title: Dogbot
subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
description: Explore the scientific concepts of levers, linkages, pulleys, mechanical programming, force and friction.

title: Motorized Fan
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to energy, simple machines, motorized movement, performance, and fair testing.

title: Turn Using Sensor
subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Your mission is to program your robot to complete a point turn to an exact angle by using the Gyro Sensor.

title: Dinosaur
subtitle: Pneumatics Add-on Set
description: Design and make a dinosaur model that has pneumatic movement.

title: Acceleration of Gravity

description: The Free Fall learning module highlights the time-distance equation when an object is accelerating.

title: Hydro Turbine
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy with reference to conversion of the kinetic energy of moving water to electrical energy

subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore transfer, transformation, storage and dissipation of energy using a block and tackle pulley system

title: Hand Generator
subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Explore the conversion of mechanical energy into electrical energy using a hand-operated generator

subtitle: Renewable Energy Add-on Set
description: Apply knowledge and skills related to simple machines, mechanisms, solar powered energy, performance, and fair testing.

subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set

subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set

subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set

subtitle: MINDSTORMS® EV3 Core Set
description: Use the Move Steering block to steer the Driving Base.

subtitle: Simple & Powered Machines Set
